course.title: MAT 4143 Groups and Galois Theory (3 units)
course.desc: Group actions, class equation, Sylow theorems, central, composition and derived series, Jordan-Holder theorem, field extensions and minimal polynomials, algebraic closure, separable extensions, integral ring extensions, Galois groups, fundamental theorem of Galois theory, finite fields, cyclotomic field extensions, fundamental theorem of algebra, transcendental extensions.Course Component: LecturePrerequisite: MAT 4141 or MAT 3143 or (MAT 2141 and MAT 2143 and MAT 3343).
